attributes.action: Modify the 2011 Census question 20 on religion to include "Atheist" as an explicit choice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are atheist or agnostic as a deliberate and considered choice. The question on religion makes a presumption that "atheist" or "agnostic" are identical with "no religion" which is misleading and incorrect. We live in a multicultural and secular society, in which many people firmly believe that there is no deity. This belief should be treated equally with faiths in determining government policies.
